name: ILS Motion Sensor (MPU6050 IMU)
description: 6-axis motion tracking with accelerometer and gyroscope. Uses professional MPU6500 library with Kalman and Complementary filtering for accurate tilt angles!
author: ILS

hardware.address: 0x68 (default) or 0x69 if AD0 pin is high

features.kalman_filter: Advanced Kalman filtering for smooth, accurate angles
features.complementary_filter: Fast complementary filtering for real-time control
features.calibration: Gyroscope offset calibration for drift-free readings

kalman.description: Most accurate angle estimation, removes sensor noise

complementary.description: Fast angle estimation with good accuracy
complementary.performance: Very fast, good for quick responses

examples.name: Simple Motion Detector
examples.description: Detect when sensor is moved or shaken

examples.name: Tilt Display with Kalman
examples.description: Show smooth pitch and roll angles on OLED

examples.name: Gaming Controller
examples.description: Use complementary filter for fast tilt control

examples.name: Self-Balancing Robot
examples.description: Use Kalman filter for stable balance control

examples.name: Activity Tracker
examples.description: Count steps and measure movement intensity
